name: Charlie Hoffmann
bio:
HOFFMANN Christian Hoffmann
born Aug. 1, 1862-died Apr. 14, 1926
his wife Hannah Balsden
Dec. 28, 1862-Mar. 2, 1937
their son Charlie
born Oct. 20, 1906-died Apr. 11, 1981
his wife Clara Morlock
born Jan. 4, 1902-died Apr. 30, 1988
(back)Peter Hoffmann
born Mar.3, 1826-died Jan. 5, 1913
his wife Johanna Callfas
born Mar. 10, 1835-died Feb. 5, 1918
their daughters
Eliza Ann Hoffmann
born May 11, 1866-died Apr. 15, 1890
Mary Hoffmann
wife of H. Stanley
born Dec. 26, 1855-died July 19, 1891
